name: Stuff You Should Know
tagline: If you've ever wanted to know about champagne, satanism, the Stonewall Uprising, chaos theory, LSD, El Nino, true crime and Rosa Parks then look no further
description: Josh and Chuck have you covered. Stuff You Should Know is a fun, informative podcast that explains how everything works. From the mundane to the extraordinary, Josh Clark and Charles W. Chuck Bryant make learning entertaining.
cons: Can be surface-level on complex topics
